## placeTile() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Place a tile on a board.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function placeTile(board: GameBoard, tileId: TileId, coordinate: HexCoordinate): GameBoard;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

board


</td><td>

[GameBoard](./hive-lib.gameboard.md)


</td><td>

A game board.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

tileId


</td><td>

[TileId](./hive-lib.tileid.md)


</td><td>

The tile to place.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

coordinate


</td><td>

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)


</td><td>

The coordinate where the tile will be placed.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[GameBoard](./hive-lib.gameboard.md)

A new game board with the tile placed at the specified coordinate.

## Remarks

This function does not mutate the provided board. Rather, it places the tile on a copy of the board. Internally the copy of the board is created using [structuredClone](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/structuredClone)<!-- -->.
